column1: TITLE. White Clay Creek Stage and Discharge 1968-2012
ABSTRACT. These are White Clay Creek stage measurements as determined from continuous data loggers
and discharge measurements derived from the stage measurements using site specific rating curves.
LOCATION. White Clay Creek at Spencer Road bridge near Avondale
CITATION. Continuous streamflow data collected by Stroud Water Research Center
COMMENTS. Times have been rounded to the nearest 15 or 5 minutes depending on the measurement/interpolation time interval.
Stage data was sourced from data loggers as follows:
